list.description: Here are various things I've made

items.title: Games
items.description: This is a bunch of games or "toys" that I've made for fun.

list.description: This is a bunch of games or "toys" that I've made for fun.

items.title: Psycosnake
items.description: A snake clone with pretty colors.

items.title: Dodge
items.description: A 3D arcade game that never happened

items.title: Tools
items.description: These are some useful tools for performing various tasks

list.description: These are some useful tools for performing various tasks

items.title: Flash Cards
items.description: A tool that can be used to help memorize things. Record question - answer pairs

items.title: Soundz
items.description: A toy for generating sounds with an Oscillator in your browser. Open several windows and jam out.

items.title: SVG Test
items.description: This can be used to test making SVG images, it lets you view the SVG image you're working on on the right of the page.

items.title: Random From List
items.description: Chooses one item from a list specified

items.title: Random Remove
items.description: Removes a random item from a list until there are none left

items.title: List Randomizer
items.description: Shuffles a list of items in a random fashion

items.title: Userscripts
items.description: These are single file plugins that let you do various things.

list.description: These are single file plugins that let you do various things.

items.title: Autopoke
items.description: This automatically responds to pokes on Facebook for you.

items.title: XKCD News Substitutions
items.description: This does some word substitutions that make news stories more fun to read.

items.title: No Typing Notifications
items.description: This gives you a more stealthy Facebook chat experience by blocking people from seeing the "seen" and "typing" notifications.
